attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Tell the USA that Britian will Not be part of any more Yank led Military campaigns on another sovereign country until the USA agree to comply with International laws, Genevia conventions and Other rules of war as they need to act in a civilized way to make progress. The PM needs to tell the USA that it needs to show evidence that can stand up to crucial international scrutiny befor any other invasion and occupation coalition can be justified.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
